00013 #include "rob_can_private.h"

00015 void CAN_get_mob(uint8_t mob)
00016 {
00017    //Only MObs from 0-14 allowed
00018    if(mob < 15)
00019    {
00020       CANPAGE = (mob << 4);
00021    }
00022 }
00023 
00024 void CAN_enable_mob_interrupt(uint8_t mob)
00025 {
00026    if (mob < 8)
00027       CANIE2 |= (1 << mob);
00028    else
00029       CANIE1 |= (1 << (mob - 8));
00030 }
00031 
00032 void CAN_disable_mob_interrupt(uint8_t mob)
00033 {
00034    if (mob < 8)
00035       CANIE2 &= ~(1 << mob);
00036    else
00037       CANIE1 &= ~(1 << (mob - 8));
00038 }
00039 
00040 void CAN_set_id(uint16_t id)
00041 {
00042    // only 11-bit IDs
00043       CANIDT4 = 0;
00044       CANIDT3 = 0;
00045       CANIDT2 = (uint8_t) id << 5;
00046       CANIDT1 = (uint16_t)id >> 3;
00047       
00048       // no IDE
00049       CANCDMOB &= (~(1<<IDE));
00050 }
00051 
00052 uint16_t CAN_get_id()
00053 {
00054    uint16_t id;
00055    id = 0;
00056 
00057    id  = (uint8_t)CANIDT2  >> 5;
00058    id |= (uint16_t)CANIDT1 << 3;
00059 
00060    return id;
00061 }
00062 
00063 void CAN_set_id_mask(uint16_t idm)
00064 {
00065    // only 11-bit IDs
00066    CANIDM4 = (1 << IDEMSK); //receive only standard frames
00067    CANIDM3 = 0;
00068    CANIDM2 = (uint8_t) idm << 5; 
00069    CANIDM1 = (uint16_t)idm >> 3;
00070 }
00071 
00072 void CAN_set_dlc(uint8_t dlc)
00073 {
00074   if(dlc > 8)
00075   {
00076      dlc = 8;
00077   }
00078    // delete old CANCDMOB
00079    CANCDMOB = 0x00;
00080    // write DLC (Data Length Code)
00081    CANCDMOB |= dlc;
00082 }
00083 
00084 uint8_t CAN_get_dlc()
00085 {
00086    uint8_t dlc;
00087 
00088    dlc = (CANCDMOB & 0x0F);
00089 
00090    return dlc;
00091 }
00092 
00093 void CAN_set_data(uint8_t dlc, uint8_t *data)
00094 {
00095    uint8_t i;
00096    
00097    CAN_set_dlc(dlc);
00098    
00099    for(i = 0; i < dlc; i++)
00100    {
00101       CANMSG = data[i];
00102    }
00103 }
